name: Forever Labs
headline: We bank your stem cells to help you live healthier, longer.
description: Forever Labs collects and stores adult stem cells, and develops therapies based upon stem cell rejuvenation.

#  Stem Cell Banking for Adults 
At Forever Labs, we bank your stem cells so you can live healthier, longer. Storing your stem cells with Forever Labs preserves them for future therapies that combat age-related disease, and perhaps aging itself.
[ Get Started ](https://foreverlabs.com/<http:/bit.ly/foreverlabs-signup>)
#  ADULTSTEM CELLBANKING 
Forever Labs banks your stem cells to help you live healthier, longer.
Storing your stem cells preserves them for future therapies that combat age-related disease, and perhaps aging itself.
[ **GET STARTED TODAY** ](https://foreverlabs.com/<http:/bit.ly/foreverlabs-signup>)
#  WHY BANK? 
Stem cells are unspecialized cells that divide and have the unique ability to turn into any specialized cell in the body, like blood or brain cells. Or they can replicate as additional stem cells.**Think of them as the body’s raw building blocks.**
Unfortunately, as we age, we lose stem cells, and the ones that remain often become damaged and less effective with time. 
Because of their power to multiply, morph and replace damaged or diseased cells, stem cell hold unlimited and invaluable potential for future health treatments. **Preserve your body’s building blocks!**
Whether you are 20 or 60 years old, the stem cells you have now will be more effective than any future ones. 
Your stem cells are unique to you, and because of their uniqueness, you are your own best donor.
Currently, there are more than 1,000 clinical trials using stem cells to treat diseases and decline related to age. 
Your stem cells will never be as young as they are, right now, so what are you waiting for? 
#  Bank Your Stem Cells 
Forever Labs collects and cryo-preserves your stem cells,
creating the youngest possible bank of your unique stem
cells so they're ready for use in future health treatments and therapies. 
#  Annual Storage Plan 
_Annual Storage Plans Include:_
  *     * Stem cell collection
    * Cryopreservation process
    * First year of storage _*_


[ Get Started ](https://foreverlabs.com/<http:/bit.ly/foreverlabs-signup>)
_*Annual recurring storage fee of $250_
#  Lifetime Storage Plan 
_Lifetime Storage Plans Include:_
  *     * Stem cell collection
    * Cryopreservation process
    * Lifetime storage of stem cells


[ Get Started ](https://foreverlabs.com/<http:/bit.ly/foreverlabs-signup>)
[ ](https://foreverlabs.com/<https:/foreverlabs.com/pages/how-it-works>)

We collect and cryo-preserve your stem cells in our [ISO 20387 accredited lab](https://foreverlabs.com/<https:/cabportal.touchstone.a2la.org/index.cfm?event=directory.detail&labPID=D4A4AF15-2196-473A-87BD-CA92F2B7D24E>).

Forever Labs was founded on the principle that our biology is an asset to our long-term health.

Your participation could help unlock discoveries that will one day benefit you.
#  Stem Cell Banking for Adults 
At Forever Labs, we bank your stem cells so you can live healthier, longer.
Storing your stem cells with Forever Labs preserves them for future therapies
that combat age-related disease, and perhaps aging itself.
[ Get Started ](https://foreverlabs.com/<http:/bit.ly/foreverlabs-signup>)
###  How It Works 
Stem cell banking offers a way to freeze our stem cells in time. We cryopreserve your cells so that the day your cells are thawed, they are effectively the same age as the day they were frozen.All that is needed to preserve this vital resource is a small sample. Each of us at Forever Labs has stored our stem cells. Feel free to reach out to us, we are happy to talk about it.
[ Learn More ](https://foreverlabs.com/<https:/foreverlabs.com/pages/how-it-works>)
####  Collect 
A Forever Labs Physician will collect your stem cells in a one-time, out-patient procedure.
####  Store 
Your stem cells are cryogenically frozen and safely stored in an FDA-compliant clinical-grade biorepository.
####  Access 
Your stem cells are stored until you need them to combat age-related diseases with advanced therapies.
#  WHY BANK? 
Stem cells are unspecialized cells that divide and have the unique ability to turn into any specialized cell in the body, like blood or brain cells. Or they can replicate as additional stem cells.**Think of them as the body’s raw building blocks.**
Unfortunately, as we age, we lose stem cells, and the ones that remain often become damaged and less effective with time. 
Because of their power to multiply, morph and replace damaged or diseased cells, stem cell hold unlimited and invaluable potential for future health treatments. **Preserve your body’s building blocks!**
Whether you are 20 or 60 years old, the stem cells you have now will be more effective than any future ones.
Your stem cells are unique to you, and because of their uniqueness, you are your own best donor.
Currently, there are more than 1,000 clinical trials using stem cells to treat diseases and decline related to age.
Your stem cells will never be as young as they are, right now, so what are you waiting for?

#  Stem Cell Banking for Adults 
Forever Labs banks your stem cells to help you live healthier, longer.
Storing your stem cells preserves them for future
therapies that combat age-related disease, and perhaps aging itself.
#  WHY BANK? 
Your adult stem cells are a specialized population of cells that have **the unique ability to self-renew and differentiate into multiple tissue types.**
Because of this, they can replenish dying cells and regenerate damaged tissue. You can think of them as the tools your body uses to repair damage acquired over time.
**As we age, the number and function of our stem cells decline.** But what if you could stop time on this invaluable resource and preserve the biological potential of these cells for the future. 
###  By banking your cells with Forever Labs, you’re ensuring access to your younger biology for when you need it. 
![](https://i.shgcdn.com/3988fa0e-ac89-416f-96d3-dee02385c43e/-/format/auto/-/preview/3000x3000/-/quality/lighter/)
Whether you are 20 or 60 years old, the stem cells you have now will be more effective than any future ones. 
![](https://i.shgcdn.com/3eaf0968-15e5-48ce-8575-150328dd8427/-/format/auto/-/preview/3000x3000/-/quality/lighter/)
Your stem cells are unique to you, and because of their uniqueness, you are your own best donor.
![](https://i.shgcdn.com/0fbf2c71-53ac-45b1-ab7f-f0757ff0903a/-/format/auto/-/preview/3000x3000/-/quality/lighter/)
Currently, there are more than 1,000 clinical trials using stem cells to treat diseases and decline related to age. 
![](https://i.shgcdn.com/a6c9d3be-5890-4d6a-b210-5b08ef12a292/-/format/auto/-/preview/3000x3000/-/quality/lighter/)
Your stem cells will never be as young as they are, right now, so what are you waiting for?

###  How It Works 
Stem cell banking offers a way to freeze our stem cells in time. We cryopreserve your cells so that the day your cells are thawed, they are effectively the same age as the day they were frozen.All that is needed to preserve this vital resource is a small sample. Each of us at Forever Labs has stored our stem cells. Feel free to reach out to us, we are happy to talk about it.
[ Learn More ](https://foreverlabs.com/<https:/foreverlabs.com/pages/how-it-works>)
####  Collect 
A Forever Labs Physician will collect your stem cells in a one-time, out-patient procedure.
####  Store 
Your stem cells are cryogenically frozen and safely stored in an FDA-compliant clinical-grade biorepository.
####  Access 
Your stem cells are stored until you need them to combat age-related diseases with advanced therapies.
###  "WHY WE STARTED FOREVER LABS" 
##  THE SCIENCE BEHINDFOREVER LABS 
Your stem cells replenish and support your vital tissues and body systems. Research indicates that the decline in the number and viability of stem cells plays a role in the physical decline associated with aging. In fact, injecting genetically-matched young stem cells into aged mice significantly increases their lifespan. Forever Labs can cryopreserve your cells now, so that you have a reserve of your own young stem cells for future use.
[ **SEE THE RESEARCH** ](https://foreverlabs.com/<https:/foreverlabs.com/pages/research>)
##  THE SCIENCE BEHIND FOREVER LABS

###  "WHY WE STARTED FOREVER LABS" 
##  CLIENT STORIES ❤ I BANKED BECAUSE 
Our clients bank their stem cells for a variety of reasons that are personal to them. 
[Learn more about our clients stories, here. ](https://foreverlabs.com/</pages/testimonials>)
_" Why wouldn't I give myself the option of having my youngest possible stem cells available for use in the future? I can't say for sure that I'll need them, but if I do, I am 100% certain that I'll be glad that I have them available."_
**-Aron**
_" When the opportunity to bank my stem cells with Forever Labs was presented to me, it was a no brainer. I have banked all 3 of my children's cord blood to save for the future. I needed to give myself the same security and opportunities that I gave them."_
**-Kalyn**
_" I stored my stem cells so that I would have the full range of medical options if and when the time came that I needed them. Also, because the team at Forever Labs explained everything in terms I could understand and made me feel safe and taken care of throughout the process."_
**-Brian**
_"...these cells are likely to be used for a multitude of disease management from heart disease to dementia, and all studies show that younger cells are better. So regardless of the disease, I’ll have access to my 39 year old cells."_
**-Tom**
_"...stem cell therapy has also shown much promise in fixing damage in joints, shoulders, and a variety of other injuries today. For the cost of the procedure, it was a great investment for the future."_
**-Curry**
_"As a mother of two, active young boys, I feel its important to keep myself as healthy as possible for as long as possible. After reading about the technology that Forever Labs is using and the potential for future therapies, making the decision to store my stem cells was easy."_
**-Ashley**

Your stem cells are stored until you need them to combat age-related diseases with advanced therapies.
#  WHY BANK? 
Stem cells are unspecialized cells that divide and have the unique ability to turn into any specialized cell in the body, like blood or brain cells. Or they can replicate as additional stem cells.**Think of them as the body’s raw building blocks.**
Unfortunately, as we age, we lose stem cells, and the ones that remain often become damaged and less effective with time. 
Because of their power to multiply, morph and replace damaged or diseased cells, stem cell hold unlimited and invaluable potential for future health treatments. **Preserve your body’s building blocks!**
Whether you are 20 or 60 years old, the stem cells you have now will be more effective than any future ones.
Your stem cells are unique to you, and because of their uniqueness, you are your own best donor.
Currently, there are more than 1,000 clinical trials using stem cells to treat diseases and decline related to age.
Your stem cells will never be as young as they are, right now, so what are you waiting for? 
#  Bank Your Stem Cells 
Forever Labs collects and cryo-preserves your stem cells, creating the youngest
possible bank of your unique stem cells so they're ready for use in future health
treatments and therapies.

#  Stem Cell Banking for Adults 
Forever Labs banks your stem cells to help you live healthier, longer.
Storing your stem cells preserves them for future
therapies that combat age-related disease, and perhaps aging itself.
#  WHY BANK? 
Your adult stem cells are a specialized population of cells that have **the unique ability to self-renew and differentiate into multiple tissue types.**
Because of this, they can replenish dying cells and regenerate damaged tissue. You can think of them as the tools your body uses to repair damage acquired over time.
**As we age, the number and function of our stem cells decline.** But what if you could stop time on this invaluable resource and preserve the biological potential of these cells for the future. 
###  By banking your cells with Forever Labs, you’re ensuring access to your younger biology for when you need it. 
![](https://i.shgcdn.com/3988fa0e-ac89-416f-96d3-dee02385c43e/-/format/auto/-/preview/3000x3000/-/quality/lighter/)

###  How It Works 
Stem cell banking offers a way to freeze our stem cells in time. We cryopreserve your cells so that the day your cells are thawed, they are effectively the same age as the day they were frozen.All that is needed to preserve this vital resource is a small sample. Each of us at Forever Labs has stored our stem cells. Feel free to reach out to us, we are happy to talk about it.
 Learn More ⟨3⟩
####  Collect 
A Forever Labs Physician will collect your stem cells in a one-time, out-patient procedure.
####  Store 
Your stem cells are cryogenically frozen and safely stored in an FDA-compliant clinical-grade biorepository.
####  Access 
Your stem cells are stored until you need them to combat age-related diseases with advanced therapies.
###  "WHY WE STARTED FOREVER LABS" 
##  THE SCIENCE BEHINDFOREVER LABS 
Your stem cells replenish and support your vital tissues and body systems. Research indicates that the decline in the number and viability of stem cells plays a role in the physical decline associated with aging. In fact, injecting genetically-matched young stem cells into aged mice significantly increases their lifespan. Forever Labs can cryopreserve your cells now, so that you have a reserve of your own young stem cells for future use.
 **SEE THE RESEARCH** ⟨13⟩

##  CLIENT STORIES ❤ I BANKED BECAUSE 
Our clients bank their stem cells for a variety of reasons that are personal to them. 
Learn more about our clients stories, here. ⟨14⟩
_" Why wouldn't I give myself the option of having my youngest possible stem cells available for use in the future? I can't say for sure that I'll need them, but if I do, I am 100% certain that I'll be glad that I have them available."_
**-Aron**
_" When the opportunity to bank my stem cells with Forever Labs was presented to me, it was a no brainer. I have banked all 3 of my children's cord blood to save for the future. I needed to give myself the same security and opportunities that I gave them."_
**-Kalyn**
_" I stored my stem cells so that I would have the full range of medical options if and when the time came that I needed them. Also, because the team at Forever Labs explained everything in terms I could understand and made me feel safe and taken care of throughout the process."_
**-Brian**
_"...these cells are likely to be used for a multitude of disease management from heart disease to dementia, and all studies show that younger cells are better. So regardless of the disease, I’ll have access to my 39 year old cells."_
**-Tom**
_"...stem cell therapy has also shown much promise in fixing damage in joints, shoulders, and a variety of other injuries today. For the cost of the procedure, it was a great investment for the future."_
**-Curry**
_"As a mother of two, active young boys, I feel its important to keep myself as healthy as possible for as long as possible. After reading about the technology that Forever Labs is using and the potential for future therapies, making the decision to store my stem cells was easy."_
**-Ashley**

generated_description:
**Forever Labs** is a pioneering company based in Ann Arbor, MI, founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S17. Their mission? To bank your stem cells in order to help you live healthier and longer. 

At the core of Forever Labs’ offering is adult stem cell banking. They collect and cryogenically preserve your stem cells, which are essentially the body's raw building blocks capable of morphing into various specialized cells. This is especially important because, as we age, our stem cells diminish in quantity and effectiveness, making the ones you have now exponentially more valuable than any future cells. 

Their approach combines cutting-edge science with practical utility—around 1000 clinical trials are currently leveraging stem cells to treat age-related diseases. By banking your cells, you ensure access to this youthful biology when you might need it most.

Forever Labs operates with a compact team of 12, and offers plans for both annual storage (which starts at a $250 annual recurring fee) and lifetime storage options. They underscore the importance of personal ownership: your stem cells are unique to you, which makes you your own best donor.

For more details, their website is a treasure trove of information on how the process works, from the initial collection by a physician to the secure cryogenic storage in FDA-compliant facilities. And—if you’re curious or have questions—the friendly team at Forever Labs is just a call away at (888) 344-8463.

In a world increasingly focused on healthspan—rather than just lifespan—Forever Labs is positioning itself as a key player in the burgeoning anti-aging and regenerative medicine spaces. So, if you're weighing the idea of banking your stem cells, consider this your nudge to explore the potential benefits. After all, your stem cells will never be as young as they are today. What are you waiting for? Dive deeper into their offerings and see how they might fit into your long-term health strategy. 

For those interested, you can explore more at [Forever Labs](https://foreverlabs.com).
